Check the appropriate box below if the Form 8-K filing is intended to simultaneously satisfy the filing obligation of the Registrant under any of the following provisions: &nbsp; &#9744; Written communications pursuant to Rule 425 under the Securities Act (17 CFR 230.425) &nbsp; &#9744; Soliciting material pursuant to Rule 14a-12 under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14a-12) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14d-2(b)) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 13e-4(c) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.13e-4(c)) Indicate by check mark whether the Registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the Registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;8.01 Other Events. On September&nbsp;12, 2017, Apple Inc. (&#147;Apple&#148;) consummated the issuance and sale of $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Apple&#146;s 1.500% Notes due 2019 (the &#147;2019 Notes&#148;), $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Apple&#146;s 2.100% Notes due 2022 (the &#147;2022 Notes&#148;), $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Apple&#146;s 2.900% Notes due 2027 (the &#147;2027 Notes&#148;) and $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Apple&#146;s 3.750% Notes due 2047 (the &#147;2047 Notes&#148; and, together with the 2019 Notes, the 2022 Notes and the 2027 Notes, the &#147;Notes&#148;), pursuant to an underwriting agreement (the &#147;Underwriting Agreement&#148;) dated September&nbsp;5, 2017 among Apple and Goldman Sachs&nbsp;&amp; Co. LLC, Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner&nbsp;&amp; Smith Incorporated, as representatives of the several underwriters named therein. The Notes are being issued pursuant to an indenture, dated as of April&nbsp;29, 2013 (the &#147;Indenture&#148;), between Apple and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as trustee, together with the officer&#146;s certificate, dated September&nbsp;12, 2017 (the &#147;Officer&#146;s Certificate&#148;), issued pursuant to the Indenture establishing the terms of each series of Notes. The Notes are being issued pursuant to Apple&#146;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on April&nbsp;28, 2016 (Reg. No.&nbsp;333-210983) (the &#147;Registration Statement&#148;). Interest on the Notes will be paid semi-annually in arrears on March&nbsp;12 and September&nbsp;12 of each year, beginning on&nbsp;March&nbsp;12, 2018. The 2019 Notes will mature on September&nbsp;12, 2019. The 2022 Notes will mature on September&nbsp;12, 2022. The 2027 Notes will mature on September&nbsp;12, 2027. The 2047 Notes will mature on September&nbsp;12, 2047. The Notes will be Apple&#146;s senior unsecured obligations and will rank equally with Apple&#146;s other unsecured and unsubordinated debt from time to time outstanding. The foregoing description of the Notes and related agreements is qualified in its entirety by the terms of the Underwriting Agreement, the Indenture and the Officer&#146;s Certificate (including the forms of the Notes). Apple is furnishing the Underwriting Agreement and the Officer&#146;s Certificate (including the forms of the Notes) attached hereto as Exhibits 1.1 and 4.1 through 4.5, respectively, and they are incorporated herein by reference. The Indenture is filed as Exhibit 4.1 to Apple&#146;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on April&nbsp;29, 2013 (Reg. No.&nbsp;333-188191). The computation of Apple&#146;s ratio of earnings to fixed charges is filed as Exhibit 12.1 to Apple&#146;s Current Report on Form 8-K filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on August&nbsp;18, 2017. An opinion regarding the legality of the Notes is filed as Exhibit 5.1, and is incorporated by reference into the Registration Statement; and a consent relating to the incorporation of such opinion is incorporated by reference into the Registration Statement and is filed as Exhibit 23.1 by reference to its inclusion within Exhibit 5.1. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &nbsp; (d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exhibits &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 1.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Underwriting Agreement, dated September&nbsp;5, 2017, among Apple Inc. and Goldman Sachs&nbsp;&amp; Co. LLC, Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner&nbsp; &amp; Smith Incorporated, as representatives of the several underwriters named therein 4.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Officer&#146;s Certificate of Apple Inc., dated September&nbsp;12, 2017 4.2 &nbsp;&nbsp; Form of Global Note representing the 2019 Notes (included in Exhibit 4.1) 4.3 &nbsp;&nbsp; Form of Global Note representing the 2022 Notes (included in Exhibit 4.1) 4.4 &nbsp;&nbsp; Form of Global Note representing the 2027 Notes (included in Exhibit 4.1) 4.5 &nbsp;&nbsp; Form of Global Note representing the 2047 Notes (included in Exhibit 4.1) 5.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Opinion of Hogan Lovells US LLP 23.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Consent of Hogan Lovells US LLP (included in the opinion filed as Exhibit 5.1) SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; Date: September&nbsp;12, 2017 &nbsp; &nbsp; Apple Inc. &nbsp; &nbsp; By: &nbsp; /s/ Luca Maestri &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Luca Maestri Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer
